quests.name: Old Enemies
objectives:
Turn Pride Rock into a jungle oasis.
  ‧ 10 Base.
  ‧ 3 Wide Jungle Plant.
  ‧ 3 Short Jungle Plant.
  ‧ 3 Small Palm Tree.
Talk to Timon.
Give Timon 15 minutes to settle into Dreamlight Valley.
Check in on Timon and see how he is doing.

Timon and Vanellope put some sort of trap in Scar's Cave...
  ‧ Talk to Scar.
  ‧ Talk to Vanellope.
  ‧ Find a way to remove the trap using your Royal Tools.
Return to Timon.
Talk to Pumbaa.

Gather the materials for the Board Game:
  ‧ 12 Softwood.
  ‧ 3 Glass.
  ‧ 1 Gold Ingot.

Gather the Ingredients for Dream Ice Cream:
  ‧ 3 Dreamlight Fruit.
  ‧ 3 Milk.
  ‧ 3 Slush Ice.

Prepare for some relaxing fun with Timon and Pumbaa.
  ‧ 3 Make some Dream Ice Cream.
  ‧ 1 Craft a Board Game.

Make sure you have:
  ‧ 2 Dream Ice Cream.
  ‧ 1 Board Game.
Bring the Dream Ice Cream and the Board Game to Timon.
Place the Board Game anywhere in the Village.
Take a picture with Timon and Pumbaa in front of your Board Game.
Return to Timon.

quests.name: Curious About Critters
objectives:
Ask Buzz and Scrooge if they have a Recording Device.
  ‧ Talk to Buzz.
  ‧ Talk to Scrooge.

Gather components by fishing in the Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Rusted Recorder
  ‧ Soaked Batteries
  ‧ Electronic Parts
Assemble the Recording Device at a Crafting Station.
Make sure you have the Recording Device in your Inventory.
Bring the Recording Device to Timon.

Take pictures of some wild critters in the Valley for Timon's documentary:
  ‧ An urban creature.
  ‧ A colorful reptile.
  ‧ A furry omnivore.
  ‧ A dark-colored critter.
  ‧ A talking dragon.
Talk to Timon.

Take pictures inside the homes of the fiercest neighbors in the Valley:
  ‧ Pride Rock.
  ‧ Scar's Cave.
  ‧ Beast's Castle.
  ‧ The Cursed Cave on Dazzle Beach.
Return to Ursula's Beach Cave.

Are Scar and Ursula plotting something?
  ‧ Listen to Scar and Ursula's conversation.
Exit the Cave.

Scar, Ursula, and Mother Gothel are up to something...
  ‧ Talk to Timon.

Scar, Ursula, and Mother Gothel are scheming... Search for clues in:
  ‧ The Giant Willow Tree.
  ‧ Scar's Cave.
  ‧ Ursula's House.
  ‧ Show the diary entries to Timon.
Enter the Vitalys Mines.

Scar and Mother Gothel are having a secret meeting in the Mines!
  ‧ Take a picture of Scar and Mother Gothel together.
  ‧ Listen to Scar and Mother Gothel's conversation.
Talk to the Forgotten about what you've found out.
Return to Timon.
Collect 1000 Star Coins for a Giant Projector.
Bring 1000 Star Coins to Scrooge McDuck to buy a Giant Projector
Place the Giant Projector anywhere in the Valley.
Take a picture of everyone reunited around the Giant Projector.
Listen to Timon talk to Scar.
Talk to Timon.

quests.name: The Timon Talk
objectives: Take a picture of Timon

Gather the materials to make Timon's Billboards:
  ‧ 24 Softwood.
  ‧ 4 Gold Ingot.
  ‧ 24 Glass.
Craft 4 Timon Billboard at a Crafting Station.

Place the Timon Billboard in:
  ‧ Peaceful Meadow.
  ‧ Dazzle Beach.
  ‧ Forest of Valor.
  ‧ Sunlit Plateau.
Talk to Simba.
Meet Timon at Pride Rock.
Talk to Timon.
Return to Pride Rock for the Timon Talk.
Listen to Timon as he gives his talk.
Talk to Timon.

Gather Ingredients:
  ‧ Unfortunate-Fish Bones in the Cursed Cave.
  ‧ Fish out Clay-Soaked Salt from the river on the Sunlit Plateau.

Gather Ingredients from the secret chamber in the Frosted Heights:
  ‧ Night Mushrooms.
  ‧ Night Thorn Nuts.

Gather the remaining Ingredients for Timon's creative meals:
  ‧ 1 Chili Pepper.
  ‧ 1 Milk.
  ‧ 1 Cucumber.
  ‧ 1 Lettuce.
  ‧ 2 Tomato.

Cook Timon's creative meals for Anna and Elsa:
  ‧ Glowing Purple Salad
  ‧ Unfortunate-Fish Soup

Bring the creative meals to Anna and Elsa:
  ‧ Bring the Glowing Purple Salad to Anna.
  ‧ Make sure to have the Glowing Purple Salad in your Inventory.
  ‧ Bring the Unfortunate-Fish Soup to Elsa.
  ‧ Make sure to have the Unfortunate-Fish Soup in your Inventory.
Return to Timon.
Go to The Lion King Realm.
Catch 2 Fireflies in The Lion King Realm.
Make sure you have 2 the Fireflies.
Bring the Fireflies to Moana.
Return to Timon.

It's time for an Uncle vs. Nephew contest!
  ‧ Talk to Donald Duck.
Examine the Treasure Map in your Inventory.

Help Donald find the treasure before Scrooge McDuck.
  ‧ (Look at the Treasure Map in the Memories section of your Collection menu for help.)

You found all of the treasure!
  ‧ Talk to Donald Duck.
Talk to Timon.

Talk to Timon's best friends:
  ‧ Simba
  ‧ Pumbaa
Return to Timon.

quests.name: The Infestation Part 1
objectives: Follow Timon in the Plaza.
Search and investigate a Night Mite Nest in the Plaza.
Catch 3 Night Mites around the Plaza.
The Night Mite Nest won't budge. Return to Timon.
Talk to the Forgotten about clearing the Night Mite Nest.

Gather materials for the Night Mite Wings:
  ‧ 3 Gold Nugget.
  ‧ 5 Fabric.
  ‧ 30 Fiber.

Gather Ingredients for the Dreamlight Boost Tonic:
  ‧ 3 Night Mushroom from the Frosted Heights' secret room.
  ‧ 1 Ginger.
  ‧ 1 Sugarcane.

Make and drink a Dreamlight Boost Tonic.
  ‧ Brew a Dreamlight Boost Tonic at a Cooking Station.
  ‧ Drink the Dreamlight Boost Tonic.
Craft the Night Mite Wings.
Make sure you have the Night Mite Wings in your Inventory.
Return to Timon.

Dress up with:
  ‧ Night Mite Wings
  ‧ Some Black Clothing.
  ‧ Some Purple Clothing.
Remove the Night Mite Nest from the Plaza.
Return to Timon.

quests.name: The Infestation Part 3
objectives: Check in with Timon for the next steps in battling the infestation.
Meet with Timon and Pumbaa in the Plaza.
Follow Timon towards the Dark Castle.
Talk to Timon in the Dark Plaza.
Enter the Dark Castle.

Clear the Dark Castle's Mite infestation:
  ‧ Remove 5 Night Mite Nest you can find.
  ‧ Chase down all (10) the loose Night Mites.
  ‧ Regroup with Timon at the top of the Dark Castle.
Talk to Pumbaa upstairs in the Dark Castle.
Collect and activate the Dark Pickaxe Upgrade from the chest in the Dark Castle.
Reach the Night Mite Queen's Nest by breaking the strange rocks in the Dark Castle.
Catch the remaining 3 Night Mites.
Catch the Night Mite Queen.
Remove the Night Mite Queen's Nest.

The Dark Castle is cleared of Night Mites!
  ‧ Return to Timon.
Return to Dreamlight Valley through the portal.
Complete "The Infestation Finale" with Merlin.
Talk to Timon

quests.name: Drawings?
objectives: Photograph 7 Simba drawings in The Lion King Realm
